title: Uncontrolled bushfire burning east of Robe in south-east SA
description: The South Australian Country Fire Service has issued a watch and act alert for an uncontrolled bushfire burning east of Robe, in the state's south-east.
content:
The South Australian Country Fire Service (CFS) has issued a watch and act alert for an uncontrolled bushfire burning east of Robe, in the state's south-east.

title: Maui mayor’s plan to phase out vacation rentals would increase housing but shrink the economy
description: HONOLULU — An unprecedented proposal from Maui’s mayor to phase out vacation rentals would alleviate a severe housing shortage aggravated by the 2023 wildfires but would also shrink the economy, University of Hawaii economists said in a report published Monda…
